dmca.title: STATEMENT OF SIMON LICHTENBERG
dmca.body:
STATEMENT OF SIMON LICHTENBERG 


I, SIMON LICHTENBERG of House No. 415, No. 2388 Hongqiao Road, Shanghai 200335, China, founder and president of the Trayton Group of companies consisting of Trayton Holdings, Trayton Timbers Ltd, Shanghai Trayton Co Ltd, Shanghai Trayton Furniture Co Ltd and Shanghai Trayton Computer Systems Ltd state as follows: 

Google Removal Request [#13584015] 

1. The Google website in question is that situated in the territory of the United Kingdom (google.co,uk). 

2. My country of residence is China and I am a citizen of Denmark. 

3. Unlawful Material 

a) Search Query: Simon Lichtenberg 

Infringing Web pages: 

www.tvindalert.com/newspapers/2004/Simon_lichtenberg_admits_chinese.htm - 7k
www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton.htm - 11k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.html - 28k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind36.html - 7k 
www.tvindalert.com/ - 16k 

w ww.rickross.com/groups/tvind.html -17k 

b) Search Query: Trayton 

Infringing Wcb pages: 

www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton$.htm - 11k www.tvindalert/com/newspapers/2004/simon_lichtcnbcrg_admits_chinese.htm - 7k 
www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind35.html - 6k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind36.html - 7k 

c) Search Query: Trayton Holdings 

Infringing Web pages: 
www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton_holdings_ltd.htm - 5k - Supplemental Result 
www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton$.htm - 11k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.html - 28k www.staff.hum.ku.dk/jesfab/abouttvind.htm - 61k 

d) Search Query: Shanghai Trayton 
Infringing Web pages: 
www.tvindalert.com/countries/China/china.htm - 53k www.tvindalert.com/companies/companylistfull.htm - 62k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind35.html - 6k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.htm1- 28k 

e) Search Query: Shanghai Trayton Furniture 
Infringing Web pages:
www.tvindalert.com/countries/China/china.htm - 53k www.tvindalert.com/companies/companylistfull.htm - 62k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.html - 28k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind35.html - 6k 

f) Search Query: Shanghai Trayton Computer Systems 
Infringing Web pages:
www.tvindalert.com/countries/China/china.htm - 53k www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton$.htm - 11k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.html- 28k 

g) Search Query: Trayton Group 
Infringing Web pages:
www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton$.htm- 11k www.tvindalert.com/companies/trayton_group.htm - 6k 
www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind36.html - 7k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind35.html - 6k 
h) Search Query: Trayton China 

Infringing Web pages: 

www.tvindalert.com/countries/China/china.htm - 53k www.tvindalert.com/newspapers/2000/trayton3.htm - 12k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind34.html - 28k www.rickross.com/reference/tvind/tvind36.html - 7k 

4. Each of the search results identified above contains defamatory information about me that is not permitted under the laws of England and Wales, where publication has taken place. 

5. Please liaise with my solicitor, Smeetesh Kakkad, should you need to contact me. His details are: 

Mr Smeetesh Kakkad 
Salans
Clements House 
14 18 Gresham Street 
London EC2V 7NN 
England 
Tel: +44 (0) 20 7509 6046 
Fax: 44(0) 20 7726 6191 
E-mail skakkad@salans.com 

6.  The tvindalert.com website above allow readers to send it more information about me to md015e1579@blueyonder.eu.uk. This is the only contact address available. 

The ricicross.com website has the following contact details: 

The Rick A. Ross Institute 
Newport Financial Center 
113 Pavonia #323 
Jersey City, NJ 07310-1756 
Phone: (201) 434-9234 Fax: (201) 435-7108 
email: info@rickross.com URL: http://www.rickross.com 


7 I have a good faith belief that the information specified above violates my rights, is not authorised by me, and is otherwise not permitted by applicable law. 

8. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate. 
SIGNED: 
NAME: Simon Lichtenberg
DATE: 22/11/04
